backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three app features (Home Screen, Destination Input, Alert Settings) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the dark cinematic design system.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'MY REMINDER' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing screen navigation (home/destination/alert), shared reminder state, and toast notifications, rendering all three screens inside a mobile frame wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AlertSettingsScr: Alert settings screen allowing users to select a pre-arrival reminder time (1/2/5 min), toggle sound, and save the reminder, with golden accent styling and a destination summary card.
frontend/src/components/DestinationInput: Destination input screen featuring a styled search bar, filtered suggested destinations list, and a static dark map preview with a golden marker pin, navigating to alert settings on proceed.
frontend/src/components/HomeScreen.tsx: Home screen displaying the animated app logo, bold golden 'MY REMINDER' title, an active reminder summary card when set, and a prominent golden 'Set Destination' CTA button.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: A Toast notification component that displays a success message with a CheckCircle icon, styled with a dark golden-accented glassmorphism design and slide-in animation.
frontend/src/components/TopNavBar.tsx: A top navigation bar component with a back button (ArrowLeft icon), a centered title, and an optional right-side element, styled with the app's dark/gold theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining the dark cinematic theme with golden accents using OKLCH color tokens, Tailwind base/utilities, custom animations (slide, fade, toast), and mobile-frame layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens (gold, surface, appbg), Inter font family, custom border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the GPS-based destination reminder app 'MY REMINDER', including its dark/gold UI design system, implemented feature list, architectural notes, and image asset requirements.
